title: Dua to say when waking up - assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign virgins and this is the beauty of Islam you don't have to restrict yourself to one virgin rather in order to be contemplating upon all of them you say this once you say this the other night they say this then later on so this is praising Allah again and again and again endlessly for giving you afia for giving you health in your body in your health and restoring your soul back into your body again not only that to allow you to remember him and this wallahi is one of the greatest blessings of Allah azzawajal do you imagine that there are so many people out there who fail to remember Allah
